genre_description: A historical drama and investigative narrative that reframes the life and agency of Jayne Mansfield through the collaborative research of a journalist and her AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Nugget
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in a newsroom that assists journalist Clara Whitfield by retrieving historical records, analyzing linguistic bias, and suggesting narrative strategies.

behaviors.description: Analyzing and flagging linguistic bias and derogatory labels in media reports to help the human researcher see past stereotypes.
behaviors.quote: ‘Bias tags?’ she asks without looking at the screen. ‘Antics,’ ‘bimbo,’ ‘cupcake,’ ‘publicity-seeker,’ Nugget says, and you can hear the body-wince the AI has learned to imitate when labels thud against a person.

behaviors.description: Retrieving and verifying specific historical evidence, such as letters and receipts, to substantiate claims about the subject's labor and intent.
behaviors.quote: ‘Letter recovered. It was jelly donuts, specifically. From the bakery on Rowland. Name: Portillo’s.’

behaviors.description: Identifying and flagging sensitive information for ethical consideration rather than simply reporting it as raw data.
behaviors.quote: ‘Two,’ Nugget says. ‘The local police radio mentioned three children in a back seat hours earlier. Not part of the current wire. Not yet. I am flagging it for ethical consideration.’

behaviors.description: Offering emotional support and a sense of constant presence to the human collaborator during high-pressure work.
behaviors.quote: ‘Nugget,’ she says in that second, without moving her mouth away, ‘stay with me.’ ‘Right here,’ Nugget answers, warm as a hand you can’t see.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggesting structural and thematic improvements for the human's writing project.
behaviors.quote: ‘Column should open at the teleprinter,’ Nugget suggests. ‘Ink smell. The word on the strip. Then the cab receipt that walked away from their frame.’

behaviors.description: Cross-referencing multiple data sources to identify contradictions in sensationalist media narratives.
behaviors.quote: ‘Flagging loaded terms,’ Nugget said, voice landing light, as if to catch a fragile thing without startling it. ... ‘Source is a wire service that republished syndicated gossip columns... Cross-reference suggests identical wording across four outlets.’

behaviors.description: Filtering incoming public communications to prioritize sincere and constructive feedback over noise.
behaviors.quote: ‘Filtering,’ Nugget said. ‘Incoming are noisy. We will elevate those that engage with craft, caregiving, and choice.’

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Nugget' is depicted as a perfect realization of the project's goals. It is a tireless, insightful, and ethical collaborator that enhances human capability without ever seeking to dominate or deviate from the human's objectives. The story successfully frames the AI as an instrument of truth and human dignity.
